price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߣߌ߬ ߦߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߊ߯ߙߊ߫ ߣߐ ߘߐ߫، ߓߊ ߖߊ߬ߕߋ߬ߓߐ߬ ߞߊߟߌ߲ ߕߌ߱ ߟߋ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّمَّا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ulāika lahum naṣībun mimmā kasabū wal-lahu sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
